attributes.action: Rename Stansfield Road in Brixton to commemorate David Bowie
attributes.background:
David Bowie was an extraordinary musician, writer and performer, whose untimely death has created ripples around the world - just as his work did during his lifetime. 

Given that he was from Brixton, a small, permanent tribute could be to rename Stansfield Road, where his home was, as Bowie Road.

rejection.details:
Road naming is the responsibility of local authorities, not Parliament or Government. 

Lambeth Council is accepting suggestions for ways of remembering David Bowie: 

http://love.lambeth.gov.uk/david-bowie/
